extendedInfo.description: ** THIS APP IS NOW RETIRED, PLEASE USE THE NEW OFFICIAL WEFUNK APP INSTEAD : https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.wefunkradio.radioapp **WEFUNK is a weekly radio mix show, hosted and produced for more than a decade by Montreal DJs Professor Groove and DJ Static. Tune in any time and experience hip hop's roots and future along with the rich legacy of funk, soul and jazz.Apparently does not work on Cliq - logs or crash reports required so I can fix please!

reviews.comment: Sweet the best radio show ever, thanks loads mate, been waiting for a portable wefunk, love seeing the show notes too. Keep it funky!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Yea Montreal!
reviews.comment: 24/7 with Professor Groove and DJ Static, my most used app! Flawless! Thank you!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Wow! my favorite itunes radio station for 5 years goes anywhere with me now.recently crashed my itunes and lost years of music, but doesn\'t mater now
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I should give 5 stars for the radio
reviews.comment: Please make it funky make it funky on Samsung galaxy. Do not work and it s not acceptable for the market best app not to work on galaxy. Please.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best show ever.
reviews.comment: I\'ve been listening regularly since 1997 and its still just as amazing as when I stumbled upon it back then. From James Brown to Aloe Blacc. Keep creating and I\'ll keep downloading. Works great on Droid Global 2.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Samsung infuse
reviews.comment: Doesnt work for my infuse....i love this station tho :/...pls update.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Good songs comes on. But the sounds goes in and out. You can start jammin. Then no sound. Mytouch
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Nice! Because adobe doesnt work right and other audio players drop the stream. But no archive access keeps me from giving 5 stars.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: absolutely amazing. big props to these DJs an the maker of the app. the only music app I use now, uninstalled Pandora and the others.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Worked fine until two months ago on Droid X. Hasn\'t worked since.

reviews.comment: It works on my Cliq vers. 2.1! Yay! Love you funky Canadians!
